summary.title: 🚀 Senior Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer | Microservices Architect
summary.overview: Passionate software engineer with expertise in building scalable, high-performance applications and leading technical initiatives. Proven track record in system optimization, team leadership, and driving business growth.
achievements: 📈 Scaled user base from 100 to 10,000+ with optimized microservices architecture
⚡ Achieved 200% performance improvement through distributed caching
🔍 Enhanced search capabilities with 80% performance boost using Elasticsearch
🔄 Implemented event-driven systems with 200% faster processing
👥 Led and grew offshore team from 0 to 10+ members
🔐 Pioneered secure SSO implementation with Google and Microsoft

experience.title: Software Engineer - Consultant
experience.description: Leading technical initiatives and overseeing offshore team development while implementing scalable solutions.
achievements: Spearheaded technical initiatives to resolve release blockers and optimize CI/CD pipelines for 8+ microservices
Oversaw the growth of an offshore team from 0 to 10+ members
Engineered an Event-driven Celery task system, achieving 200% faster processing
Pioneered enterprise search architecture with Elasticsearch, achieving 80% performance improvement
Designed distributed caching architecture, maximizing system throughput by 200%
Implemented SSO with Google and Microsoft, enabling secure third-party authentication
Successfully migrated to GraphQL-over-WS, reducing latency and enabling bidirectional communication
Instrumental in company growth, with user numbers jumping from 100 to over 10,000
